company_description: Replace this with a short description of your company or the purpose of this landing page.
hero_subheadline: A supporting subheadline that explains the value you offer to visitors.
service_1_description: Describe the first key benefit or feature. Focus on what the visitor gains, not what you do.
service_2_description: Describe the second key benefit or feature. Use specific outcomes when possible.
service_3_description: Describe the third key benefit or feature. Address a common pain point your audience has.
faq_1_answer: Explain the core problem your product or service addresses. Be specific about who experiences this problem and why existing solutions fall short.
faq_2_answer: Walk through the process in plain language. Three steps works well: sign up, configure, launch. Keep it simple.
faq_3_answer: Describe your ideal customer. Be specific enough that the right people see themselves, but broad enough to not exclude good fits.
faq_4_answer: Set realistic expectations with concrete outcomes. Use numbers, percentages, or timeframes when possible.
testimonial_1_text: This product completely changed how we approach our workflow. The results spoke for themselves within the first month.
testimonial_2_text: We evaluated several options and this was the clear winner. The team adopted it quickly and the ROI was obvious.
about_description: Use this section to tell your story. Why does this offering exist? What gap in the market did you see? What makes your approach different? Write for the reader, not for search engines. Authenticity builds trust faster than keywords.
meta_description: Replace this with a meta description under 160 characters. Summarize what this page offers and include a call to action.
